New Records: If Hungary avoids defeat, they will extend their unbeaten streak to 13 games, surpassing the record set in the early 2000s.
Pre-Game Insights: The Hungarian national soccer team has maintained an unbeaten streak since November 17, 2022, with 12 matches played.
The match between Hungary and Turkey is scheduled for March 22, 2024, at 8:45 pm in Puskás Arena, Budapest.
The game will be played in front of a full house, and spectators are advised to arrive at least one and a half hours before kick-off and to utilize public transportation.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The last time the Hungarian national team enjoyed such a successful run was over 20 years ago, between March 2000 and April 2001, when they remained unbeaten for 12 matches.
The 'Golden Team' had a comparable streak, winning 15 of 18 games and drawing three after losing the 1954 World Cup final. Their streak was halted in February 1956 by Turkey.
